name: Clear Blue Skies Part One
description:
| Horror | Kinetic Visual Novel | Slice of Life |

⚠️ Please read the content warning below before playing. If any of the content below upsets you in some way, please do not play the visual novel. Always prioritise your mental health first and foremost in any situation. ⚠️

Content Warning (possible spoilers)

  • Mental Health
  • Implications of Abuse
  • Possible Jump scare (if you think a shadowy figure is scary)
  • Bullying

If any of these topics again trigger you in any way, it is recommended not to play. If you know the warnings and continue on playing, please note that this is fiction. I do not and will never support any of these actions displayed in the visual novel.  If any of these occurrences happen in real life, it is purely coincidental.

Riley has encountered multiple episodes regarding her fall into the ocean on a train when she was a teenager.  She only remembers fragments of her memories and has is now talking to her doctor about this.  Go down memory lane in this first instalment with Riley to uncover her memories and to understand her story.  Never judge a book by its cover, or in this case, a person by their perfect smile. Ajeb.  Alumo Royalty Free Music.  Tim Beek.  Lornn.  FieraRyan.  Fesiliyan Studios.  Orpog.     Machaon maackii.  Onboroo.
